value: Yeh likhna jaruri hota hai. Agar hum yeh property container ki class mei nahi likhenge toh flex nahi chalega. Jiske vajah se koi aur bhi flex ki property kaam nahi karegi.Isse likhne se ek html tag flex container ki tarah behave karta hai.
Iss example mei container ki css mei display flex likh kar dekho ki kya hota hai.
